title: Ekalavya's Tribute: The Tale of the Thumb

chapters.title: The Aspiring Archer
chapters.description: Ekalavya, a tribal prince, deeply desired to learn archery under Guru Dronacharya, the renowned master.

chapters.title: Self-Taught Virtuoso
chapters.description: Denied mentorship, Ekalavya created a statue of Drona and practiced diligently, mastering archery on his own.

chapters.title: Drona's Demand
chapters.description: Impressed yet uneasy, Dronacharya asked Ekalavya for a gurudakshina: his right thumb as a tribute.

chapters.title: The Sacrifice
chapters.description: Ekalavya, without hesitation, severed his thumb, demonstrating unparalleled respect and devotion.
